title: How to measure the length of access-ways- The length of main means of access shall be determined by the distance from the farthest plot or building plot and the main street
clause_text: How to measure the length of access-ways- The length of main means of access shall be determined by the distance from the farthest plot or building plot and the main street. The length of a subsidiary access-way shall be measured from the point of its origin and the next wider road it meets.
section: Means of Access to be Constructed & Maintained
